name: La Pulguita
overview: "La Pulguita" is a tribute to the 1983 hit game "La Pulga" created by Paco Suárez and Paco Portalo for the company Indescomp. This game is "guilty" of many hours of 8-bit fun and one of the first that I had the chance to try on my beloved Spectrum. The simplicity and entertainment capacity of this classic have tried to be replicated in "La Pulguita".
